content.en: Network Security Algorithms: Researchers have developed various algorithms to address different research questions related to network security. These algorithms, such as Set Pair Analysis, AHP, Spa's three-Yuan connection degree, grey relational clustering analysis, particle swarm optimization, Lie group kinematics, Prefix Span algorithm, Bayesian Decision Network, big data technology, improved neural network, I-HMM, time-varying evidence theory, data clustering, D-S evidence theory, multisource data analysis, superiority algorithm, information entropy, A priori algorithm, and evidential reasoning algorithm, are used to assess risk, analyze security situations, predict threats, optimize protection, and improve management in computer networks. These algorithms leverage the power of artificial intelligence and big data technology to enhance network security.
content.da: Netværkssikkerhedsalgoritmer: Forskere har udviklet forskellige algoritmer til at adressere forskellige forskningsspørgsmål relateret til netværkssikkerhed. Disse algoritmer, såsom Set Pair Analysis, AHP, Spa's tre-Yuan forbindelse grad, grå relationel klyngeanalyse, particle swarm optimization, Lie gruppe kinematik, Prefix Span algoritme, Bayesian Decision Network, big data teknologi, forbedret neural netværk, I-HMM, tidsvarieret evidensteori, dataklyngning, D-S evidensteori, multisource dataanalyse, overlegen algoritme, information entropi, A priori algoritme og evidentiel ræsonneringsalgoritme, bruges til at vurdere risiko, analysere sikkerhedssituationer, forudsige trusler, optimere beskyttelse og forbedre ledelsen i computernetværk. Disse algoritmer udnytter kraften af kunstig intelligens og big data teknologi til at forbedre netværkssikkerheden.
